pr_title: Create javaagent dirs for all instrumentations

timeline.message: Add note about kotlin coroutine library instrumentation

timeline.bodyText: rxjava-1.0 looks more like a library instrumentation, should we add javaagent here?
timeline.author: mateuszrzeszutek
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -144,39 +144,39 @@ include ':instrumentation:mongo:mongo-3.7'
 include ':instrumentation:mongo:mongo-async-3.3'

 include ':instrumentation:mongo:mongo-testing'

replies.bodyText: great point, sent a separate PR for this for visibility #1732
replies.author: trask

timeline.author: iNikem

timeline.bodyText: I don't think it makes sense to have javaagent sub-module in purely testing modules.
timeline.author: iNikem
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,10 +14,10 @@ dependencies {
   compileOnly group: 'javax.ws.rs', name: 'javax.ws.rs-api', version: '2.0'
   compileOnly group: 'org.glassfish.jersey.core', name: 'jersey-server', version: '2.0'
 
-  implementation project(':instrumentation:jaxrs:jaxrs-2.0:jaxrs-2.0-common')
+  implementation project(':instrumentation:jaxrs:jaxrs-2.0:jaxrs-2.0-common:javaagent')
 
-  testImplementation project(':instrumentation:servlet:servlet-3.0')
-  testImplementation project(':instrumentation:jaxrs:jaxrs-2.0:jaxrs-2.0-testing')
+  testImplementation project(':instrumentation:servlet:servlet-3.0:javaagent')
+  testImplementation project(':instrumentation:jaxrs:jaxrs-2.0:jaxrs-2.0-testing:javaagent')
